data.name: Christmas Live Wallpaper
data.detailed_description:
Just Updated

24-hour mode added to Clock.


About the Software

Classic Live Wallpaper now on Windows!

Christmas Live Wallpaper is a stunning 3D live wallpaper featuring a sparkling animated Christmas tree, and exciting Christmas countdown where you can count the days to Christmas, New Year's day, or any date you set.

This version also features a Clock scene, a combined Tree & Countdown / Clock scene, a Happy New Year scene with fireworks, a super realistic 3D Snow scene, a magical Sky Lanterns scene, plus a bonus Valentine's day scene, and dedicated Fireworks scene! (That's 9-Wallpapers-in-1!)

All scenes come with countless customisation options - right-click on the desktop or click the icon in the bottom-right notification area to open the settings panel and quickly customise your settings.

Features and Personalisation Options

★ Christmas Tree scene (6 animated camera motions)

★ 4 Christmas trees and multi-coloured sparkle mode!
★ Countdown scene (Countdown to Christmas, New Year's Countdown, and more!)
★ Set your own custom countdown dates! (Ideal for birthdays and anniversaries!)
★ Combined Christmas Tree + Countdown or Clock
★ Clock scene with sparkling time and date. Great all year round!
★ Happy New Year scene (with fireworks!)
★ 3D Snow scene (day or night)
★ Sky Lanterns scene
★ 3D Fireworks scene
★ Valentine's Day scene
★ The ability to choose any combination of your favourite scenes above for rotation.
★ A range of vibrant colour schemes, with a beautiful colour cycling mode that sweeps through all the colours of the rainbow.
★ Gorgeous glowing background light or flare spotlight with shimmering sunbeams.
★ Choose your favourite camera angles and 3D animation fly-bys.
★ Snowfall amount and speed.
★ Additional tree lights.
★ Efficient code and wallpaper engine optimised to run smoothly to save battery power on phones - so great on laptops too!
★ Automatically pauses itself when hidden by other windows - drops to 0% when you run a game or other fullscreen app.
★ Option to count down in either rounded-up days (the traditional days-to-Christmas method), or a fully accurate and nail-biting Days, Hours, Minutes and Seconds method.
★ NEW Multi-monitor support!
★ and lots lots more to play with!

Have fun! :)

If you run into a problem, please contact us at: support@jetblacksoftware.com and we'll help you directly. Thanks!

data.short_description: Beautiful 3D Live Wallpaper featuring a sparkling animated Christmas tree, and exciting Christmas countdown where you can count down the days to Christmas, New Year's day, or any date you set. Rotate between 9 themes, including clock, 3D snow and fireworks. Extensive customisation options.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit), or Windows 11
  • Processor: 1 GHz or faster processor
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 / DirectX 9 compatible or later with WDDM 1.0 driver
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Steam for use.
    Graphics are highly optimised, originally for low power phones, so any modern computer or graphics card made in the past 10 years should be more than capable.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
